plot: The true story of serial-killing con-man Roy Fontaine, who cut a bloody swath through England and Scotland, hiring himself out as a butler, robbing his employers and in some cases murdering them. His killing spree included his hated illegitimate brother and five other people before he was finally arrested and sentenced to prison for life.   Written by  Peter Bellwood
title: Monster Butler
plot_es: The true story of serial-killing con-man Roy Fontaine, who cut a bloody swath through England and Scotland, hiring himself out as a butler, robbing his employers and in some cases murdering them.
